text: arau yisakale nija pratipalakara santusti labhara babe dhairya dharana karae arau chalata kayema karae, arau ami te'omlokaka yi jiranopakarana dicho tara paraa gopane arau prakasyabharae byaya karae lagate bhala karmara dbaraa beya karmaka pratihata karae, te'omlokara babe'i ache akhiraatara subha parainama
